recipe.title: Shrimp Scampi
recipe.description: Garlic butter shrimp with white wine and fresh herbs

steps.descr: Melt butter in a large pan over medium heat
steps.instructions: Melt butter in a large pan over medium heat

on_enter.say: Let's melt the butter in a large pan over medium heat. You should see it start to bubble and smell that lovely buttery aroma.

steps.descr: Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 minute
steps.instructions: Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook 1 minute

on_enter.say: Now, let's add the garlic and a pinch of red pepper flakes. Cook for about one minute until the garlic is fragrant and just starting to turn golden.

steps.descr: Add shrimp and cook until pink (2-3 minutes per side)
steps.instructions: Add shrimp and cook until pink (2-3 minutes per side)

on_enter.say: Right, let's add the shrimp now. Cook them for about two to three minutes on each side until they turn a lovely pink colour.

steps.descr: Pour in wine and lemon juice
steps.instructions: Pour in wine and lemon juice

on_enter.say: Let's pour in the white wine and squeeze in the juice of one lemon. Give it a good stir and enjoy the fresh aroma!
Now, let's simmer the sauce for a few minutes until it reduces slightly. You'll notice it thickening up a bit.
Time to stir in that fresh parsley. It adds a lovely pop of colour and freshness.

steps.descr: Serve over pasta or with bread for dipping
steps.instructions: Serve over pasta or with bread for dipping

on_enter.say: Fantastic! Let's serve this beautiful shrimp scampi over some pasta or with crusty bread for dipping. Enjoy your meal!

notes.text:
Don't overcook shrimp - they cook quickly
Use good quality white wine
Extra lemon juice brightens the dish
